thread.title: Lim Yoona, Lee Chae-min's 'Bon Appétit, Your Majesty' to stream on Netflix | ABS-CBN Entertainment
thread.title_full: Lim Yoona, Lee Chae-min's 'Bon Appétit, Your Majesty' to stream on Netflix | ABS-CBN Entertainment

author: Jaehwa Bernardo
title: Lim Yoona, Lee Chae-min's 'Bon Appétit, Your Majesty' to stream on Netflix | ABS-CBN Entertainment
text: \u003eLim Yoona, left, and Lee Chae-min in \u0026#x27;Bon Appétit, Your Majesty.\u0026#x27; \u003cem\u003ePhotos courtesy of Netflix\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/div\u003e\u003cp\u003eFilipino fans of Lim Yoona and Lee Chae-min can look forward to the actors\u0026#x27; team-up project, \u0026quot;Bon Appétit, Your Majesty,\u0026quot; as the romantic comedy series arrives on Netflix in August.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003ePremiering on August 23,, the series follows Yeon Ji-young, a French-trained chef at the height of her culinary career, who is suddenly transported to dynastic Korea and compelled to cook for the notoriously temperamental King Yeon-hui.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cdiv\u003e\u003cspan class=\\ \u003ePoster for \u0026#x27;Bon Appétit, Your Majesty.\u0026#x27; \u003cem\u003ePhoto courtesy of Netflix\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/div\u003e\u003cp\u003eYoona portrays Ji-young, a no-nonsense chef with a perfectionist attitude who strives to survive in the royal kitchen and win over an impossible king.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cdiv\u003e\u003ca href=\\ \u003eLim Yoona, left, and Lee Chae-min in \u0026#x27;Bon Appétit, Your Majesty.\u0026#x27; \u003cem\u003ePhotos courtesy of Netflix\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/div\u003e\u003cp\u003eFilipino fans of Lim Yoona and Lee Chae-min can look forward to the actors\u0026#x27;
